text: Q61.| For relation R = (L, M, N, O, P) the following dependencies hold: {M—->0O,NO—-P,P—>LandL— MN} R is decomposed into R1 = (L, M, N, P) and R2 = (M, O). The decomposition is: (a) Lossless decomposition and dependency preserving (b) Lossless decomposition and not dependency preserving BASIC DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM Pa; o (c) Lossy decomposition and dependency preserving (d) Lossy decomposition and not dependency preserving
